projects.title: Flight form
projects.description: The task was to build a copy of the Norwegian flight booking form with the CSS done with SASS.

projects.title: Product page
projects.description: The task was to build a product listing page in React and using a JSON file for rendering the product information.

projects.title: Signup form
projects.description: The task was to build a signup form for a web service and style it according to a web site of our choice. I chose the form that Acne Studios uses for the member registry. The data is posted in a HTTPbin.

projects.title: Radio player
projects.description: The task was to build a working radio player that fetches information from the Sveriges Radio API.

projects.title: VAT calculator
projects.description: The task was to build a VAT calculator and create controlled components that gives you control of form elements which would otherwise store their own state. The different fields will automatically change on input.

projects.title: Snake Game
projects.description: The task was to get a feeling how the game engine Unity works and how to put together different elements in an environment and try different settings.
